page.title: 05ASKEW HILL FARM, QUERNMORE
page.content: Askew Hill Farm belongs to Mr and Mrs Hughes. It is on Littledale Road going out of Quernmore. They own 200 acres, which are pastures and meadow land. It is no particular kind of grass.They do not silo they just haytime.Their land joins with the Duke of Westminster's They have 100 beef cattle.Their breed is Charolais crossed with Friesian and Hereford. They have 160 lambing ewes, which lamb in April. The breeds of sheep which they have on the farm are Horned sheep and Rough Fell crossed with Mulehog. They have 1 house dog which is a Lakeland terrier. They also have two working sheepdogs. On their farm they don't have any vegetable garden but they do have flower gardens and a green house.
